    Message sent by a client to create a new game

    Message sent when a client flips a card

    Message sent when the client sends an invalid input

    Message sent when a client asks to place a card and is resent back if the placement is valid

    Message sent by the server when a client has to start his turn

    Message sent when the game is ended and contains a string with the names of the winners
